TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件的插入按钮时 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 控件内单击时，之后控件插入记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查插入操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 一个对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受影响的插入操作的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常中的事件处理方法通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问插入的记录的值，使用属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下控制返回到由指定的模式插入操作之后的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 如果在插入操作期间发生异常，则可以保留控件处于插入模式，通过设置属性设置为`true`。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象传递给事件处理方法事件以确定是否在插入操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，表示执行插入操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the insert operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||对象中包含`e`参数。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定受影响的插入操作的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the insert operation. 此属性通常用于验证在以下情况下插入了正确的记录数：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was inserted in the following situations: - 验证已插入单个记录。Verify that only a single record was inserted. 有时，如果未正确编写的 insert 语句可以插入多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 验证不会引发异常在插入操作期间发生错误时，已插入一条记录。Verify that a record was inserted when an error occurs during the insert operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证数据源控件，如支持冲突检测 （乐观并发） 时插入了记录并控件，具有其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。Verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下不可能插入一条记录同时具有相同的密钥由另一个用户的记录值。Under this setting, a record that has the same key value as a record by another user concurrently might not be inserted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以验证插入操作期间已插入一条记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was inserted during the insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示插入操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定异常 （如果有） 插入操作过程中引发。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置属性设置为`true`; 否则为控件重新引发的异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在插入操作期间引发了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当插入操作期间引发异常时，使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，异常将被视为处理且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果此属性设置为`false`，则控件重新引发的异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作完成后 控件是否仍保持插入模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.

value.span: 如果在插入操作完成后仍保持插入模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下控制返回到由指定的模式属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 使用属性指定是否控件插入操作完成后应保持在插入模式下。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation. 若要保持控件处于插入模式，将此属性设置为`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 仅在这种情况发生 （如正在引发的异常） 需要比往常一样的行为不同的控件时，应使用此属性。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控件需要默认情况下仍保持插入模式，设置属性改为。If the control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来保持控件处于插入模式时插入操作过程中发生异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep the control in insert mode when an exception occurs during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已插入记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 一个含有字典的 对象，其中包含已插入记录所对应的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: An object that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问用于插入记录的字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录插入的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回对象，它实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示插入的记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要访问的字段名称，请使用属性的对象。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，通过使用访问的字段值属性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如) 可以仅按索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问中的项集合。The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the items in the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/CS/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluesvb.aspx#1)]
